result.eng: Assuming he is right, where does that leave us?
result.ga: Abraimis go bhfuil an ceart aige Cá bhfágann sé sin muidne
result.orig: Abraimis go bhfuil an ceart aige Cá bhfágann sé sin muidne
result.html: Abraimis go bhfuil an ceart aige Cá bhfágann sé sin muidneAssuming he is right, where does that leave us?
result.ponchtml: Abraimis go ḃfuil an ceart aige Cá ḃfágann sé sin muidneAssuming he is right, where does that leave us?

result.eng: Are they listening to us?
result.ga: An bhfuil siad ag éisteacht linn
result.orig: An bhfuil siad ag éisteacht linn
result.html: An bhfuil siad ag éisteacht linnAre they listening to us?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil siad ag éisteaċt linnAre they listening to us?

result.eng: She threatened to take us to court.
result.ga: Bhagair sí an dlí orainn
result.orig: Bhagair sí an dlí orainn
result.html: Bhagair sí an dlí orainnShe threatened to take us to court.
result.ponchtml: Ḃagair sí an dlí orainnShe threatened to take us to court.

result.eng: They were supposed to protect us.
result.ga: Bhí siad in ainm muid a chosaint
result.orig: Bhí siad in ainm muid a chosaint
result.html: Bhí siad in ainm muid a chosaintThey were supposed to protect us.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad in ainm muid a ċosaintThey were supposed to protect us.

result.eng: That was known to us from the intelligence we received beforehand.
result.ga: Bhí sé sin ar eolas againn ón fhaisnéis a fuair muid roimh ré
result.orig: Bhí sé sin ar eolas againn ón fhaisnéis a fuair muid roimh ré
result.html: Bhí sé sin ar eolas againn ón fhaisnéis a fuair muid roimh réThat was known to us from the intelligence we received beforehand.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé sin ar eolas againn ón ḟaisnéis a fuair muid roiṁ réThat was known to us from the intelligence we received beforehand.

result.eng: What are they saying about us?
result.ga: Cad atá siad ag rá inár dtaobh
result.orig: Cad atá siad ag rá inár dtaobh
result.html: Cad atá siad ag rá inár dtaobhWhat are they saying about us?
result.ponchtml: Cad atá siad ag rá inár dtaoḃWhat are they saying about us?

result.eng: That caused us problems.
result.ga: Chothaigh sé sin fadhbanna dúinn
result.orig: Chothaigh sé sin fadhbanna dúinn
result.html: Chothaigh sé sin fadhbanna dúinnThat caused us problems.
result.ponchtml: Ċoṫaiġ sé sin faḋbanna dúinnThat caused us problems.

result.eng: He introduced his new wife to us.
result.ga: Chuir sé a bhean chéile nua in aithne dúinn
result.orig: Chuir sé a bhean chéile nua in aithne dúinn
result.html: Chuir sé a bhean chéile nua in aithne dúinnHe introduced his new wife to us.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir sé a ḃean ċéile nua in aiṫne dúinnHe introduced his new wife to us.

result.eng: Every one of us.
result.ga: Gach duine againn
result.orig: Gach duine againn
result.html: Gach duine againnEvery one of us.
result.ponchtml: Gaċ duine againnEvery one of us.

result.eng: An accident happened to us on the way to Ireland.
result.ga: Ghabh timpiste dúinn ar an bhealach go hÉirinn
result.orig: Ghabh timpiste dúinn ar an bhealach go hÉirinn
result.html: Ghabh timpiste dúinn ar an bhealach go hÉirinnAn accident happened to us on the way to Ireland.
result.ponchtml: Ġaḃ timpiste dúinn ar an ḃealaċ go hÉirinnAn accident happened to us on the way to Ireland.

result.eng: Thank you for sharing your expertise with us.
result.ga: Go raibh maith agat as do shaineolas a roinnt linn
result.orig: Go raibh maith agat as do shaineolas a roinnt linn
result.html: Go raibh maith agat as do shaineolas a roinnt linnThank you for sharing your expertise with us.
result.ponchtml: Go raiḃ maiṫ agat as do ẛaineolas a roinnt linnThank you for sharing your expertise with us.

result.eng: He created us in his own image.
result.ga: Ina chosúlacht féin a chruthaigh sé sinn
result.orig: Ina chosúlacht féin a chruthaigh sé sinn
result.html: Ina chosúlacht féin a chruthaigh sé sinnHe created us in his own image.
result.ponchtml: Ina ċosúlaċt féin a ċruṫaiġ sé sinnHe created us in his own image.

result.eng: Tell us a story, daddy.
result.ga: Inis scéal dúinn a dhaidí
result.orig: Inis scéal dúinn a dhaidí
result.html: Inis scéal dúinn a dhaidíTell us a story, daddy.
result.ponchtml: Inis scéal dúinn a ḋaidíTell us a story, daddy.

result.eng: That's right but they won't believe us.
result.ga: Is fíor sin ach ní chreidfidh siad muid
result.orig: Is fíor sin ach ní chreidfidh siad muid
result.html: Is fíor sin ach ní chreidfidh siad muidThat's right but they won't believe us.
result.ponchtml: Is fíor sin aċ ní ċreidfiḋ siad muidThat's right but they won't believe us.

result.eng: Whenever you feel like helping us, you will be welcome.
result.ga: Má bhíon fonn ort cuidiú linn beidh fáilte romhat
result.orig: Má bhíon fonn ort cuidiú linn beidh fáilte romhat
result.html: Má bhíon fonn ort cuidiú linn beidh fáilte romhatWhenever you feel like helping us, you will be welcome.
result.ponchtml: Má ḃíon fonn ort cuidiú linn beiḋ fáilte roṁatWhenever you feel like helping us, you will be welcome.

result.eng: Aren't you supposed to be helping us?
result.ga: Nach bhfuil tú in ainm is a bheith ag cuidiú linn
result.orig: Nach bhfuil tú in ainm is a bheith ag cuidiú linn
result.html: Nach bhfuil tú in ainm is a bheith ag cuidiú linnAren't you supposed to be helping us?
result.ponchtml: Naċ ḃfuil tú in ainm is a ḃeiṫ ag cuidiú linnAren't you supposed to be helping us?

result.eng: Reveal your opinions. Tell us what you think.
result.ga: Nocht do chuid tuairimí
result.orig: Nocht do chuid tuairimí
result.html: Nocht do chuid tuairimíReveal your opinions. Tell us what you think.
result.ponchtml: Noċt do ċuid tuairimíReveal your opinions. Tell us what you think.

result.eng: They couldn't help us.
result.ga: Ní raibh siad in ann cabhrú linn
result.orig: Ní raibh siad in ann cabhrú linn
result.html: Ní raibh siad in ann cabhrú linnThey couldn't help us.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ siad in ann caḃrú linnThey couldn't help us.

result.eng: She has given us very reasonable advice.
result.ga: Thug sí comhairle an-chiallmhar dúinn
result.orig: Thug sí comhairle an-chiallmhar dúinn
result.html: Thug sí comhairle an-chiallmhar dúinnShe has given us very reasonable advice.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug sí coṁairle an-ċiallṁar dúinnShe has given us very reasonable advice.

result.eng: She gave us an account of her adventures in Africa.
result.ga: Thug sí cuntas dúinn ar a heachtraí san Afraic
result.orig: Thug sí cuntas dúinn ar a heachtraí san Afraic
result.html: Thug sí cuntas dúinn ar a heachtraí san AfraicShe gave us an account of her adventures in Africa.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug sí cuntas dúinn ar a heaċtraí san AfraicShe gave us an account of her adventures in Africa.

result.eng: They are around us.
result.ga: Tá siad timpeall orainn
result.orig: Tá siad timpeall orainn
result.html: Tá siad timpeall orainnThey are around us.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad timpeall orainnThey are around us.

result.eng: My name us Áine Ní Chonaill.
result.ga: Áine Ní Chonaill is ainm dom
result.orig: Áine Ní Chonaill is ainm dom
result.html: Áine Ní Chonaill is ainm domMy name us Áine Ní Chonaill.
result.ponchtml: Áine Ní Ċonaill is ainm domMy name us Áine Ní Chonaill.

result.eng: Give us two notebooks and two pencils, please.
result.ga: Tabhair dhá chóipleabhar agus dhá pheann luaidhe dúinn le do thoil
result.orig: Tabhair dhá chóipleabhar agus dhá pheann luaidhe dúinn le do thoil
result.html: Tabhair dhá chóipleabhar agus dhá pheann luaidhe dúinn le do thoilGive us two notebooks and two pencils, please.
result.ponchtml: Taḃair ḋá ċóipleaḃar agus ḋá ṗeann luaiḋe dúinn le do ṫoilGive us two notebooks and two pencils, please.

result.eng: They will not be staying with us.
result.ga: Ní bheidh siad ag fanacht in éindí linn
result.orig: Ní bheidh siad ag fanacht in éindí linn
result.html: Ní bheidh siad ag fanacht in éindí linnThey will not be staying with us.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃeiḋ siad ag fanaċt in éindí linnThey will not be staying with us.

result.eng: He is the teacher that will be coming with us.
result.ga: Is é an múinteoir a bheas ag tíocht linn
result.orig: Is é an múinteoir a bheas ag tíocht linn
result.html: Is é an múinteoir a bheas ag tíocht linnHe is the teacher that will be coming with us.
result.ponchtml: Is é an múinteoir a ḃeas ag tíoċt linnHe is the teacher that will be coming with us.

result.eng: All ten of us were there.
result.ga: Deichniúr againn ar fad a bhí ann
result.orig: Deichniúr againn ar fad a bhí ann
result.html: Deichniúr againn ar fad a bhí annAll ten of us were there.
result.ponchtml: Deiċniúr againn ar fad a ḃí annAll ten of us were there.

result.eng: My mother's aunt is living with us as well.
result.ga: Tá aintín le mo mháthair ina cónaí linn chomh maith
result.orig: Tá aintín le mo mháthair ina cónaí linn chomh maith
result.html: Tá aintín le mo mháthair ina cónaí linn chomh maithMy mother's aunt is living with us as well.
result.ponchtml: Tá aintín le mo ṁáṫair ina cónaí linn ċoṁ maiṫMy mother's aunt is living with us as well.

result.eng: She didn't like the look of us.
result.ga: Níor thaitin ár ndreach léi
result.orig: Níor thaitin ár ndreach léi
result.html: Níor thaitin ár ndreach léiShe didn't like the look of us.
result.ponchtml: Níor ṫaitin ár ndreaċ léiShe didn't like the look of us.

result.eng: It was the children who saved us!
result.ga: Na leanaí a thug slán sinn
result.orig: Na leanaí a thug slán sinn
result.html: Na leanaí a thug slán sinnIt was the children who saved us!
result.ponchtml: Na leanaí a ṫug slán sinnIt was the children who saved us!

result.eng: What does this tell us about the author?
result.ga: Cad a insíonn seo dúinn faoin údar
result.orig: Cad a insíonn seo dúinn faoin údar
result.html: Cad a insíonn seo dúinn faoin údarWhat does this tell us about the author?
result.ponchtml: Cad a insíonn seo dúinn faoin údarWhat does this tell us about the author?

result.eng: It was she who turned us and our faith into a laughing stock!
result.ga: Ise a rinne ceap magaidh dínne agus dár gcreideamh
result.orig: Ise a rinne ceap magaidh dínne agus dár gcreideamh
result.html: Ise a rinne ceap magaidh dínne agus dár gcreideamhIt was she who turned us and our faith into a laughing stock!
result.ponchtml: Ise a rinne ceap magaiḋ dínne agus dár gcreideaṁIt was she who turned us and our faith into a laughing stock!

result.eng: The needs are putting the blame on us.
result.ga: Tá na meáin ag déanamh ceap milleáin asainn
result.orig: Tá na meáin ag déanamh ceap milleáin asainn
result.html: Tá na meáin ag déanamh ceap milleáin asainnThe needs are putting the blame on us.
result.ponchtml: Tá na meáin ag déanaṁ ceap milleáin asainnThe needs are putting the blame on us.

result.eng: The company should have notified us of this this six months ago.
result.ga: Ba cheart don chomhlacht seo a chur in iúl dúinn sé mhí ó shin
result.orig: Ba cheart don chomhlacht seo a chur in iúl dúinn sé mhí ó shin
result.html: Ba cheart don chomhlacht seo a chur in iúl dúinn sé mhí ó shinThe company should have notified us of this this six months ago.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċeart don ċoṁlaċt seo a ċur in iúl dúinn sé ṁí ó ẛinThe company should have notified us of this this six months ago.

result.eng: I thought it was silly of us to argue.
result.ga: Cheap mé gur sheafóideach an mhaise dúinn a bheith ag argóint
result.orig: Cheap mé gur sheafóideach an mhaise dúinn a bheith ag argóint
result.html: Cheap mé gur sheafóideach an mhaise dúinn a bheith ag argóintI thought it was silly of us to argue.
result.ponchtml: Ċeap mé gur ẛeafóideaċ an ṁaise dúinn a ḃeiṫ ag argóintI thought it was silly of us to argue.

result.eng: It was bad of us not be grateful to him.
result.ga: Ba dona an mhaise dúinn gan a bheith buíoch de
result.orig: Ba dona an mhaise dúinn gan a bheith buíoch de
result.html: Ba dona an mhaise dúinn gan a bheith buíoch deIt was bad of us not be grateful to him.
result.ponchtml: Ba dona an ṁaise dúinn gan a ḃeiṫ buíoċ deIt was bad of us not be grateful to him.

result.eng: There was sand to every side of us, east and west, north and south.
result.ga: Bhí gaineamh do gach leith dínn soir siar thuaidh theas
result.orig: Bhí gaineamh do gach leith dínn soir siar thuaidh theas
result.html: Bhí gaineamh do gach leith dínn soir siar thuaidh theasThere was sand to every side of us, east and west, north and south.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí gaineaṁ do gaċ leiṫ dínn soir siar ṫuaiḋ ṫeasThere was sand to every side of us, east and west, north and south.

result.eng: The darkness was to every side of us.
result.ga: Bhí an dorchadas do gach leith dínn
result.orig: Bhí an dorchadas do gach leith dínn
result.html: Bhí an dorchadas do gach leith dínnThe darkness was to every side of us.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an dorċadas do gaċ leiṫ dínnThe darkness was to every side of us.

result.eng: He had dogs with him. All I remember is their teeth snarling at us.
result.ga: Bhí madraí leis Ní cuimhin liom ach a gcuid fiacla ag drannadh orainn
result.orig: Bhí madraí leis Ní cuimhin liom ach a gcuid fiacla ag drannadh orainn
result.html: Bhí madraí leis Ní cuimhin liom ach a gcuid fiacla ag drannadh orainnHe had dogs with him. All I remember is their teeth snarling at us.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí madraí leis Ní cuiṁin liom aċ a gcuid fiacla ag drannaḋ orainnHe had dogs with him. All I remember is their teeth snarling at us.

result.eng: 'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.
result.ga: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir
result.orig: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir
result.html: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad ag teaċt faoinár ndéin liúiġ duine de na fir óga agus ḃí gliondar croí orainn go léir'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.

result.eng: There are spies amongst us.
result.ga: Tá spiairí inár measc
result.orig: Tá spiairí inár measc
result.html: Tá spiairí inár meascThere are spies amongst us.
result.ponchtml: Tá spiairí inár meascThere are spies amongst us.

result.eng: It is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.
result.ga: Is trua nach raibh JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a bhí ag an gceann a tháinig romhainn
result.orig: Is trua nach raibh JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a bhí ag an gceann a tháinig romhainn
result.html: Is trua nach raibh JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a bhí ag an gceann a tháinig romhainnIt is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.
result.ponchtml: Is trua naċ raiḃ JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a ḃí ag an gceann a ṫáinig roṁainnIt is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.

result.eng: We a have a lot ahead of us.
result.ga: Tá lán na lámh os ár gcoinne
result.orig: Tá lán na lámh os ár gcoinne
result.html: Tá lán na lámh os ár gcoinneWe a have a lot ahead of us.
result.ponchtml: Tá lán na láṁ os ár gcoinneWe a have a lot ahead of us.

result.eng: It's a bit rough for us.
result.ga: Is garbh linn é
result.orig: Is garbh linn é
result.html: Is garbh linn éIt's a bit rough for us.
result.ponchtml: Is garḃ linn éIt's a bit rough for us.
